entries.title: Nowa data - Norges Bank
entries.text: The Nowai (Nowa index) is an index representing the cumulative return on an investment earning daily compound interest at the Nowa rate.

entries.title: Money market data - Norges Bank
entries.text: Norges Bank publishes aggregated money market data based on bank's reporting to Norges Bank (RPD). Data are published approximately at 11 am each working day.

entries.title: Monetary policy - Norges Bank
entries.text: We set the policy rate to ensure low and stable inflation in Norway.

entries.title: Regulations and forms - Norges Bank
entries.text: Banks' participation in NBO is regulated by an account maintenance and settlement agreement between the individual bank and Norges Bank.

entries.text: Laws and rules relating to notes and coins in Norway. Guidelines for the use of Norwegian banknote and coin designs.

entries.title: Research - Norges Bank
entries.text: The objective of the Norges Bank Academic Programme (NBAP) is to promote macroeconomic and financial economic research and education in Norway.

entries.title: Policy for research in Norges Bank Central Banking
entries.text: Researchers in NBR should spend on average 50 percent of their work time on undirected research and 50 percent on directed research.
